text: fa'iin 'aerad hwla' almushrikun -ayha alrswl- ean al'iiman biallah fama 'arsalnak ealayhim hafzana laemalhm hataa thasbhm elyha, ma ealayk 'iilaa alblagh. w'inna 'iidha aetyna al'iinsan minaa rahmatan min ghinaan wsaeat fi almal waghayr dhlk, farih wsurra, wa'iin tusibhum musibat min fqr wmrd waghayr dhlk bsbb ma qadamath 'aydihim min measy allh, fa'iina al'iinsan jhwd yeddid almsayb, wynsa alnem
